Title: Authorizes United States citizens currently residing outside the United States whose last residence was in NY to vote in certain federal elections
Summary: Authorizes United States citizens currently residing outside the United States whose last residence in the United States was in the state of New York to vote in certain federal elections.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to authorizing United States citizens currently residing outside the United States whose last residence in the United States was in the state of New York to vote in certain federal elections
